customer_sentiment.description: The customer was frustrated with the process, particularly with the potential for further collection calls after payment and the delay in updating the system.

agent_performance: The agent was professional and attempted to address the customer's concerns, but the customer remained frustrated due to the limitations of the system.

timestamped_events.description: The assistant introduced themselves and the purpose of the call.
The assistant disclosed the debt amount and the company it was from.
The customer expressed willingness to pay the debt in full.
The assistant offered to reduce the balance if the customer paid in full.
The assistant began setting up the payment.
The customer provided their payment information.
The customer expressed frustration about potential further collection calls.
The customer continued to express frustration about the system's limitations.
The customer became more hostile, stating the process was exhausting.
